str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A merchant, trader; one on a journey. From en and the base of poreuomai; a tradesman.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To become rich, be rich, abound in. From ploutizo; to be wealthy.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From a (long) distance, afar. Adverb from makros; from a distance or afar.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
(a) fear, terror, alarm, (b) the object or cause of fear, (c) reverence, respect. From a primary phebomai; alarm or fright.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: To weep, weep for, mourn, lament. Of uncertain affinity; to sob, i.e. Wail aloud.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To mourn, lament, feel guilt. From penthos; to grieve.
